text: Nimwamenya yuko hari amatati hagati y’umugabo n’umunega wiwe, ni mwihutire kujana umubangurukanyi, umwe mumuryango w’umugabo, hamwe no mumuryango w’umunega, nibanka uko kwumvikana Imana izoba shoboza kuronka umuti w’ingorane zabo, mu vy’ukuri Imana niyo ifise ubumenyi, nyene ubumenyi bw’inkuru z’amabanga yinyegeje hamwe n’inkuru ziri k’umugaragaro
